[b][color=white]Trust Scan Update[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has added another field to the trust scan page called "Matching country of registration and latest IP". Essentially, it allows the viewer to know if the country the account was registered in is the same as the latest IP the user has logged into. This was added in order to help prevent further scams by the person who has been scamming from Greece using accounts created in other countries.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5507985] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/NotableThreads/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5507985][b]Trust Scan Addition[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
Omniscient has added a "Matching country of registration and latest IP" parameter to the trust scan system. This new parameter will let you know if a user is matching the IP of the country they registered in, as well as their latest IP.[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5509062][b]Smart Quotes[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1306528][b][color=#EFEFEF]xadamxk[/color][/b][/url]
Adam has created yet again, another awesome userscript! This one allows you to add a little cool twist to the quote feature. Things like changing the quote color for when you are mentioned and other cool things! Come check it out now!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5410947][b][ The Society ] --- Marketing, Psychology, Advertisement, & SalesCopy [ HF TUTORIAL ][/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1033713][b][color=#EFEFEF]Formula1[/color][/b][/url]
Formula1 has gotten the very first (non-purchased) sticky in the new Business Savvy section. Formula's thread is a nice "101" style helpful thread to assist those who are beginning their adventures as a businessman/woman or those who are experienced already and looking to expand their business.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5502504][b][GUIDE] Legitimate Malware Removal Tools[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3165279][b][color=#EFEFEF]Elitas[/color][/b][/url]
With help from members such as Elitas, Amidst, and members of the "Malware Removal Discord Group (MRDG)", they have created a big thread with useful malware removal tools and antivirus software.[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508047][b]Your Username[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=874137][b][color=#00AAFF]Computer Professor[/color][/b][/url]
Let the forum know why you snagged that awesome username you have! Maybe you have seen a member around the forum and curious what their name meant. Come check out this thread and have some fun.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5509078][b]Finally got my pistol[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1961000][b][color=#EFEFEF]Zexo[/color][/b][/url]
Gun fanatics, interested in seeing the new gun that Zexo recently purchased? Better not mess with Zexo now.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508104][b]Kourtney Kardashian as the prettiest pussy [Pics 18+}[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=274613][b][color=#EFEFEF]Яǝʌǝɹsǝ[/color][/b][/url]
You are probabling wondering, "what did I just read?!" Yeah, same.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5509001][b]New HF Banner[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1716927][b][color=#EFEFEF]Fade[/color][/b][/url]
What are your opinions on the new banner? Also, What are you plans for New Years? Post it in Edition 324!![/list][/list]

[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508677][b]System.out.println(" #Programmer's Feedback - 1177 Days | 1223 Rep | 5000+ Posts ");[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2004660][b][color=#00AAFF]#Programmer[/color][/b][/url]

[list][b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5509118][b][The Order] Rich Bitch Award Giveaway | Happy New Year![/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1165241][b][color=#EFEFEF]Krave[/color][/b][/url]
Happy New year to you too Krave! Thanks to The Order and their massive list of giveaways. This one is a Rich Bitch award being hosted by The Order's owner, Krave.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508321][b][The Order] $10 (and some spare) BTC Contest[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1915596][b][color=#00AAFF]Minimalist[/color][/b][/url]
Minimalist is giving away some bitcoins for one lucky member. Enter today!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508170][b][The Order] Emerald/L33T/3P1C/BTC Giveaway[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=403479][b][color=#EFEFEF]Jamieee[/color][/b][/url]
Jamieee is giving members an option to choose between winning an Emerald award, L33t, or 3P1C membership. Sound interesting to you? Test your lucky today and enter!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5506347][b][The Order] Crunchyroll Premium+ Membership Gift - One Month[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][b][color=#EFEFEF]Tsundere[/color][/b][/url]
No shame in promoting your own contest right? If you want to win a Crunchyroll membership, enter today! Let's show some love for anime!!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508196][b][$5 BTC Prize] Domain Name[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1108186][b][color=#00AAFF]Lucifer's Inferno[/color][/b][/url]
Think you are pretty creative, huh? Why not help the user Lucifer by coming up with a radical domain name he can use for his site.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508474][b]Upgrade Giveaways[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3188206][b][color=#EFEFEF]cudacore[/color][/b][/url]
This giveaway has a little twist to it. This is a giveaway in which you nominate someone to win. If you think someone deserves an upgrade contest then submit an application here.

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5502729][b]New Year Giveaway (Upgrades, Awards, Cash)[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3202613][b][color=#99FF00]Ja‌uz[/color][/b][/url]
One lucky winner will get the chance to choose one of the awards listed in this contest. Apply today for your chance to win an award or an account upgrade.[/list][/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5506451][b]2017: What is your main browser(s) and browser extension(s)?[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1522601][b][color=#00AAFF]ZuGgY[/color][/b][/url]
ZuGgY's curious to know what is your main browser, as well as what extensions you currently have. Always good to share, as someone might be interested in installing something you have mentioned!

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5508999][b]League of Legends Discord || Every Region || LoL Bot[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3238930][b][color=#EFEFEF]+Nebula[/color][/b][/url]
Interested in joining a League of Legends discord? Looking for tips and tricks or possible someone else to play with? Join this discord!
[/list][/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Interview/324.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][color=#1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669]Wirt[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Hey, Wirt. Welcome to the 324th edition of the HF News! Have any shoutouts you want to make before we begin?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] Yeah, shout out to all of The Order members, they've been with me through a lot

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Wirt, thanks for joining us during this time of celebration. We just witnessed an end to 2016. Do you have any plans for this upcoming new year?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] Well I'm currently taking classes at a local university, including select pre-law classes, and the average GPA for the law school that I plan on attending has an average GPA of around 3.6, so my goal for the new year is to keep my grades high so I can attend the graduate school of my dreams.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] That definitely requires some hard work to obtain. I wish you good luck on achieving those goals! Looking back on 2016, what are some of highlights and milestones do you think HF achieved during that time?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] Well, I took a 6 month vacation ban in the front portion of 2016 because I needed to get some shit together and HF certainly wasn't helping. Nothing against HF in any way, it's just my time management was horrible with the distraction. But since I came back I haven't noticed many major changes. I was permanently denied Ub3r for about three years though, and I politely PM'd Omni and asked him if he would give me a second chance, and he did, and I'm proud to say I'm now blue :)

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Ah, what a lucky surprise! Haha, glad you're finally on the blue side. Do you plan on being an active member of HF for most of 2017?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] For the most part. But my school work takes top priority, and if I become overwhelmed with it I may have to take some time off of HF.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] That's completely understandable. I've noticed you have been apart of the HF community for quite some time now. Has HF made a difference in your life?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] Hm. Well, HF has definitely taught me some skills that have definitely been beneficial to me to this day, and the members in the Education Nation part of HF are very informative and helpful and have made my struggles a lot easier.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] If you don't mind, can you elaborate on those skills that you've learned?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] Yeah I learned some various coding languages and the guys in Education Nation have helped teach me some material in the past that really helped me with my studies

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] I agree that HF provides a lot of opportunities for people to learn. Have you made any friends on HF that you still talk to today?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] Hm. No one user has actually stood the test of time in terms of constant conversation between us, partly because of my 6 month vacation ban :C

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Well, that's unfortunate to hear. Hopefully you're able to find someone in the near future. That's all we have for today. Thanks for joining us, Wirt!
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1748669][color=white][b]Wirt:[/b][/color][/url] No problem, thank you for having me.

[/align][/spoiler][/align]

[hr]
[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[b][color=white]Views to the HF News[/color][/b]
I've posted the Hack Forums News three times now, I hope you all enjoy reading each article :).

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Arixs.png[/img][/align]

[b][size=medium]Istanbul new year Reina nightclub attack 'leaves 39 dead'[/size][/b]
As New Year was kicking off at a night club in Reina, at 01:30 local time a gunman opened fire. The shooter has yet to be found but a search will continue throughout the week, the shooter is believed to have acted alone, says Suleyman Soylu. Suleyman also added that 69 people were injured and admitted into the hospital, of which 4 are currently in critical condition. There is currently only 21 victims that have been identified,  16 of which are foreigners. There were as many as 700 people at the night club, and it is a miracle so few was injured. [i][size=xx-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-38481521]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[color=transparent]    [/color]


[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/TechNews/Gladly.png[/img][/align]
[align=left]
[url=http://www.recode.net/2016/12/20/14026396/7-eleven-drone-delivery-flirtey-first-retail-us-reno-nevada][b]7-Eleven Becomes First to Have Commercial Drone Delivery Service in U.S.[/b][/url]
While companies such as Amazon and Google reach for the skies with their delivery drone plans, convenience store chain 7-Eleven flies ahead of them, successfully commencing their drone delivery service in Reno, Nevada. The store in Reno has reported that a total of 77 deliveries to customers within a mile of the store.  7-Eleven was also the first to make a commercial drone delivery back in July, partnering with drone maker Flirtey to deliver  The drones fly autonomously, completely self-guided by an on-board GPS.

[url=http://arstechnica.com/cars/2016/12/worlds-first-solar-road-opens-in-france/][b]World's First Solar Road Built in France[/b][/url]
After over five years of work, French construction company Colas has finally finished work on the first ever solar road, dubbed the Wattway, in Normandy, France. The road will undergo a two-year test period to make sure it is safe for daily use during heavy daily traffic, while still providing solar power. While environmentalists may be happy, some question the exhorbitant cost of the road. While the Wattway is only one kilometer long and two lanes wide, it has cost a total of 5 million Euros to build. To cover all of the countries' roads would require billions, if not trillions of Euros. According to Colas, the road works by having millimeter thin solar panels laid over roadways, and can be expanded to already existing roads. Colas also states that these road panels are about as efficient as roof solar panels, which get around 20 percent photo-voltaic efficiency. Testing will soon show whether the statement stands under extreme weather, heavy traffic, or other circumstances.

[url=http://asia.nikkei.com/Business/Companies/Apple-to-slice-iPhone-production-10][b]Apple to Cut iPhone Production by 10%[/b][/url]
Tech giant Apple has decided to slash production of 2017's iPhone model by one-tenth of the latest iPhone's numbers, due to a decrease in sales with recent models. This comes with the already slimmed down iPhone 7 and 7 Plus production cut of 20% in 2016. Sales are speculated to be down as a result of a lack of new, appealing features from consumers of Apple smartphones. Despite this, iPhone 7 line sales are still booming in Asia - specifically Japan, thanks to the IC chip reader in the iPhone 7 line, used for features such as payment processing.
[/align]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Final Fantasy Creator Announcing New Titles![/color][/b]
Final Fantasy creator Hironobu Sakaguchi may reveal his next project in 2017. In an interview with 4Gamer, as translated by DualShockers, Sakaguchi said the plan right now is to reveal this project next year, though he did not share any specifics about when the game will be revealed or what it is. Sakaguchi now works at Mistwalker as its founder and CEO. His team is working on a console version of the mobile game Terra Battle, while Mistwalker announced a technology partnership with Bravely Default company Silicon Studio for a new project back in February.As Siliconera points out, Sakaguchi has also spoken about opening a new "development-type" company, though whether or not this ties in to the new game is unclear.[i][size=x-small][url=https://gamerant.com/final-fantasy-creator-new-game-2017/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Final Fantasy Creator Announcing New Titles![/color][/b]
Although the first Pokemon Sun/Moon Global Event was less than successful, the next round offers bigger rewards for a more modest goal. The first Pokemon Global Event from earlier this month tasked players with catching 100 million Pokemon in the period from November 29 to December 13. However, the final count fell far short of that goal with just 16.5 million creatures captured. The second event will only require players around the world to catch or defeat 1 million Pokemon, but they must be discovered using the Island Scan feature. Island Scan is a new feature in Pokemon Sun/Moon that is only available after earning 100 points from scanning QR codes in the game. Using Island Scan allows players to find Pokemon that exist outside the Alola region Pokedex. This second global event will start on December 27 4:00 UTC (8PM Monday December 26 PST | 11:00 PM EST) and it will run until January 9th 2017 23:59 UTC. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.geek.com/games/pokemon-sun-and-moons-second-global-mission-begins-today-1683790/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]


[align=center]Gaming Video of the Week[sp]

[yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u8mt3WPIGe4[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]


[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/HackingNews.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]IT Techs Suspected in Bangladesh Bank Heist[/color][/b]
The Bangladesh bank hack was one of the largest of 2016. Hackers got into the Central Bank of Bangladesh and got away with $1 Billion. $81 million has yet to be recovered. Mohammad Shah Alam, heading investigations in Dhaka, is pointing to IT technicians. The belief is that IT technicians hooked up the banks transaction to the public web, giving access to the hackers. No suspects have been named or arrested[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.ehackingnews.com/2016/12/bangladesh-bank-heist-police-suspect-it.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Three Zero-Day Exploits Found in PHP 7[/color][/b]
Over 80% of websites powered by one of the web's most popular programming languages, PHP, are vulnerable to three major zero-day exploits. The exploit lies in the unserialized mechanism in PHP 7--the same one also vulnerable in PHP 5. This exploit led to the compromise of several major websites including Drupal, Joomla, Magento, vBulletin, and PornHub by sending malicious data in client cookies. Researchers at Check Point's exploit research team spent several months examining the unserialized mechanism and found "three fresh and previously unknown vulnerabilities."[i][size=x-small][url=http://thehackernews.com/2016/12/php-7-update.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Sony Music Twitter Account Hacked, Claims Britney Spears Died[/color][/b]
Sony Music's Twitter account was hacked, and multiple tweets were made, one of which was: "RIP @britneyspears 1981-2016." Later, a Tweet from Bob Dylan's account came out with similar contents. All tweets have since been deleted. A Britney Spears representative publicly denounced the the reports to CNN. Sony later admitted to their twitter account being compromised.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.hackersnewsbulletin.com/2016/12/sony-twitter-account-hacked.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]

[b][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5513845][color=#FFFFFF]Bitcoin Surges[/color][/url]
[/b]Bitcoin has been surging over the past several weeks reaching heights above that of an oz of gold in the past several hours. Just a few months ago Bitcoin was only valued at 6-700$ per coin and has now reached upwards of 1100$ will it continue to rise or crash downward? 

[b][url=http://genius.com/Migos-bad-and-boujee-lyrics][color=#FFFFFF]Drop-Top, Rain-Drop[/color][/url]
[/b]Earlier in the week the first meme of 2017 broke out from a older song made by the Migos known as "Bad and Boujee" ever since the meme blowed up all over your social media feeds you will see various meme's surrounding droptop raindrop.

Droptop. 
Raindrop.
Please Stop.
